LanguageData.BuryBones.SoilOnlyDesc: Should the pawn look for dirt, or similar soil to bury the corpse in instead of buring them under the floorboards?
LanguageData.BuryBones.SkeletonOnly: Only bury corpses that have turned into a skeleton?
LanguageData.BuryBones.SkeletonOnlyDesc: Only bury pawns with no flesh.
LanguageData.BuryBones.DebugDesc: Just some debug logging, not needed.
